name: Burmy Sandy Cloak
author: Midori Harada
flavor_text: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.

poke_power.name: Wear Cloak
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Burmy Sandy Cloak is your Active Pokémon, you may search your discard for a basic {F} Energy card and attach it to Burmy Sandy Cloak.

attacks.name: Sandy Cloak Tackle
attacks.effect: If Burmy Sandy Cloak has any {F} Energy attached to it, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.
